班.definition: team; class; grade; (military) squad; work shift; CL:個|个[ge4]; classifier for groups of people and scheduled transport vehicles

班主任.definition: teacher in charge of a class

班伯利.definition: Bunbury, coastal city in Western Australia

班伯里.definition: Bunbury, coastal city in Western Australia; Banbury, town in Oxfordshire, England

班加羅爾.definition: Bangalore, capital of southwest Indian state Karnataka 卡納塔克邦|卡纳塔克邦[Ka3 na4 ta3 ke4 bang1]

班務會.definition: a routine meeting of a squad; team or class

班吉.definition: Bangui, capital of Central African Republic

班固.definition: Ban Gu (32-92), Eastern Han dynasty historian, wrote the Dynastic History of Western Han 漢書|汉书

班基.definition: Bangui, capital of Central African Republic (Tw)

班導.definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class; homeroom teacher

班導師.definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class; homeroom teacher

班師.definition: to withdraw troops from the front; to return in triumph

班底.definition: (theater) (originally) non-leading actors; supporting cast; (now) key members of a production team (actors, directors, writers etc); (by extension) key members of a group or organization

班次.definition: grade; class number (in school); flight or run number; flight or run (seen as an item); shift (work period)

班瑪.definition: Baima or Banma county (Tibetan: pad ma rdzong) in Golog Tibetan autonomous prefecture 果洛州[Guo3 luo4 zhou1], Qinghai

班瑪縣.definition: Baima or Banma county (Tibetan: pad ma rdzong) in Golog Tibetan autonomous prefecture 果洛州[Guo3 luo4 zhou1], Qinghai

班禪.definition: Panchen (Lama); abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]

班禪額爾德尼.pinyin: bān chán é ěr dé ní
班禪額爾德尼.definition: Panchen Erdeni or Panchen Lama; abbr. to 班禪|班禅[Ban1 chan2]

班花.definition: the prettiest girl in the class

班草.definition: the most handsome boy in the class

班超.definition: Ban Chao (33-102), noted Han diplomat and military man

班輩.definition: seniority in the family; pecking order

班輩兒.definition: seniority in the family; pecking order

班輪.definition: regular passenger or cargo ship; regular steamship service

班達亞齊.definition: Banda Aceh, capital of Aceh province of Indonesia in northwest Sumatra

班達海.definition: Banda Sea, in the East Indian Archipelago

班長.definition: class monitor; squad leader; team leader; CL:個|个[ge4]

班門弄斧.definition: to display one's slight skill before an expert (idiom)

班駁.definition: variant of 斑駁|斑驳[ban1 bo2]
